channel.title: Debian to Kicksecure double swap
channel.description:
Insalled debian as encrypted lvm wich allready created user--vg-swap_1 After converted to kicksecure swap file creator still exists .
lsblk
loop0 xxx 0 3.6G 0 loop └─swapfile
user--vg-swap_1 xxx 976M 0 lvm
will same occur after convert if installed debian on bare metal

item.title: Debian to Kicksecure double swap
item.dc:creator: suse211213
item.description:
Insalled debian as encrypted lvm wich allready created user–vg-swap_1
After converted to kicksecure swap file creator still exists .

lsblk

loop0 xxx 0 3.6G 0 loop
└─swapfile

user–vg-swap_1 xxx 976M 0 lvm

will same occur after convert if installed debian on bare metal

Read full topic
